name: Plasma Punch
description: Deliver a quick series of punches that deal damage in a cone.

name: Rocket Dash
description: Dash forward knocking back enemies in your path.

name: Overheat
description: Ignite your gauntlets dealing bonus burn damage on hit for 5s.

name: Jump Jet
description: Launch into the air to gain high ground.

name: Meteor Strike
description: Crash down from the sky dealing massive AoE damage.

name: Energy Orb
description: Fire a precise orb of energy that heals allies or damages enemies.

name: Barrier Field
description: Project a shield in front of you that blocks projectiles.

name: Harmony Link
description: Tether to an ally sharing health regeneration.

name: Levitate
description: Hover above the ground moving faster and ignoring terrain.

name: Transcendence
description: Enter a heightened state becoming invulnerable and empowering allies.
